nodes.text: Swamp troopers were a division of the Imperial Army tasked with operating in swamp environments. Swamp troopers were deployed to the planet Marca to provide security for the DSI Hyperbaride Synthesis Plant. They were supported by Mekuun Corporation repulsor scouts.
The swamp troopers wore a specialized armor, and were equipped with various sensors to allow for operation in swamplands.
They also carried a specialized blaster that doubled as both a blaster and a grappling device.
